Detailed Description

Abstract base class for datebase objects in YardSale.

All DB types are assignable and contain a ToString method to format the type to text.

See also:
YardInvType

YardEmployeeType

Member Function Documentation

virtual string YardDBType::ToString (  const string &  delim = ","  )  const [pure virtual]
 

To string method formats the datatype internals into string form.

This method is pure virtual and must be implemented in derived classes.

Parameters:
delim The string to delimit internal fields with, defaults to newline.
